33.en: Ramu: Yes, We understand from Bible that suffering and sickness are not what God has intended for his creation. The mission of God is to redeem and restore the whole of creation and the church. God wants each one of us repent from our sins and come back to God. He wants each one us to be a blessings to the world.  God wants Christians to see those suffering from calamities and death with love and compassion, not with judgmental eyes.

48.en: Ramu:  We live in a broken world. This brokenness is evident whenever there is injustice, poverty, corruption, greed, violence and environment damage. As hard as it is to hear, the outbreak of Covid-19 is not a ‘natural disaster’. Rather it is a disaster of our own making. We as human abused and excessively used the forest and brought the wild animals to city. The virus from animals are transmitted to human when they come to close these Forest animals.

53.en: Ramu: Sunil, If there’s one thing that we can say for certain, Jesus himself did not know when the end times would be. Matthew 24:36 “However, no one knows the day or hour when these things will happen, not even the angels in heaven or the Son himself. Only the Father knows.” The signs which are fortold in the people are happending, but we cant claim Jesus is going come to day or tomorrow, but we need t get prepared for his coming.
